relevance_explanation: The routine includes only steps relevant to the customer, based on the data. The removal of irrelevant steps associated with non-frequent flyer customers and passport/visa checks is correct, as well as payment methods other than points.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tools, and branches that apply to this customer have been preserved. Steps correctly flow based on the customer being a Gold frequent flyer and paying with points, and the routine terminates appropriately after completing the case.
